rmml.meow.name: rmml.meow
rmml.meow.description: Invisible middleware that loads mods (It's already installed)
rmml.meow.author: Harlem512

rmmm.md.name: rmmm.md
rmmm.md.description: Manages mod installations and downloads mods.
rmmm.md.author: Harlem512

ameli_palette.name: ameli_palette
ameli_palette.description:
Obtain witchy drip. Lets you customize the colors used by Ameli.

Edit `mods/rmml/maya_palette/palette.png` with your colors, similar to Fern. Example palettes and a list of what each color means is included.
ameli_palette.author: Harlem512

archipelago.name: archipelago
archipelago.description:
The Archipelago Client for use with the Archipelago randomizer. View setup/usage information at https://github.com/dgrossmann144/
RustedMossArchipelagoClient
archipelago.author: MrL

checklist.md.name: checklist.md
checklist.md.description: Adds icons to the map for each pickup you haven't collected. Works with Minimap and Archipelago client!
checklist.md.author: Harlem512

ghost_mp.name: ghost_mp
ghost_mp.description: Adds (bad) multiplayer to Rusted Moss. Use the Fern icon on the main menu to make a lobby and add your steam friends.
ghost_mp.author: Harlem512

gimmick.md.name: gimmick.md
gimmick.md.description:
"Rusted Moss but Good," April Fools 2025 mod.
Replaces Fern's movement abilities with mid-air jumps.
gimmick.md.author: Harlem512

grapple_preview.name: grapple_preview
grapple_preview.description: Adds an option on the Grapple Settings menu to always see the (approximate) range of the grapple.
grapple_preview.author: Harlem512

maya_palette.name: maya_palette
maya_palette.description:
Obtain slashy drip. Lets you customize the colors used by Maya.

Edit `mods/rmml/maya_palette/palette.png` with your colors, similar to Fern. Example palettes and a list of what each color means is included.
maya_palette.author: Harlem512

minify.md.name: minify.md
minify.md.description: Makes Fern 50% smaller and 30% faster. NOTE: This applies to [slant]all[/slant] Fern saves.
minify.md.author: Harlem512

minimap.md.name: minimap.md
minimap.md.description: Adds a minimap to the bottom-left of the screen.
minimap.md.author: Harlem512

palette_editor.name: palette_editor
palette_editor.description:
Get that look you've ever wanted without exiting the game!
Works with Ameli and Maya palette mods (installed separately).
palette_editor.author: Snowill

puntable.md.name: puntable.md
puntable.md.description: Makes all NPCs grapple-able by the player.
puntable.md.author: Harlem512

pursuit.md.name: pursuit.md
pursuit.md.description: Rusted Moss but there's a [pulse]cool guy[/pulse] chasing you the whole time. [shake][jitter]RUN[/jitter][/shake].
pursuit.md.author: Harlem512

speedrun_timer.md.name: speedrun_timer.md
speedrun_timer.md.description: Lets you turn the speedrun timer on for normal mode and disable the timer when playing Fern speedrun mode.
speedrun_timer.md.author: Harlem512

zebedee.name: zebedee
zebedee.description:
Enables RMML developer mode. Not for human consumption.

 Should be reordered to the top of your mod list.
zebedee.author: Harlem512
